post.body: That shirt is fantastic! You must have had quite the bar mitzvah. btw- have you seen the trailer for the Friday the 13th remake?
Um, actually the Barn House has their own vat. MHB insight: I was a cocktail waitress @ the BH when I was 21. #classy
I think you mean "... purchase some manner of a DEEP FRIED chicken sandwich".
Good point.
Grottos? Really?
Yowza!
I only have one piece of advice for you . . . act like you're not hot. lol! I'm a proud GIT.
and holiday socks. ;)
Do you use http://www.where.com?
A turtleneck & cords? The only thing missing is a sweater vest!
where are you?!

merry christmas!
I wait, I wait, I wait . . . 4 my Doctor.
